mapper.select: select * from profile where id = #{id} and name = #{name}
select count(1) total , ceil(count(1)/${pageSize}) totalPage ,${pageSize} pageSize ,${currPage} currPage from profile
mapper.update: update profile set name=#{name} , birthday=#{birthday},gender=#{gender},career=#{career}, address=#{address},mobile=#{mobile},picPath=#{picPath} where id=#{id}
